============
PyBudgetPlot
============


    Simple budged plotting application.


Description
===========

    Takes a budget definition from .yaml file and plots the near future.


Installation
============

    `pip install PyBudgetPlot`


Usage
=====


Plotting a budget
-----------------

    `plot-budget /path/to/budget.yaml`


Initialize sample budget
------------------------

    `to be implemented`


Note
====

Requires Python >=3.6
